item.title: Sensex jumps 555 points, Nifty 50 ends at 24,625; investors earn over  ₹5 lakh crore— 10 key highlights from market today

review.headline_rewrite: Sensex jumps 555 points, Nifty 50 ends at 24,625; investors earn over  ₹5 lakh crore— 10 key highlights from market toda
bullets: Indian stock market benchmarks, the Sensex and the Nifty 50, ended with healthy gains on Monday, September 1, snapping their three-session losing run on
The Sensex closed with a gain of 555 points, or 0.70 per cent, at 80,364.49, while the Nifty 50 ended the day at 24,625.05,
The BSE Midcap index jumped 1.64 per cent, while the Smallcap index rose 1.49 per cent.
Investors' wealth rose by more than ₹5 lakh crore in a single session as the overall market capitalisation of BSE-listed firms jumped to nearly

item.title: Top Gainers & Losers on Sep 1: Ola, Kaynes Tech, GMDC, MCX, Swiggy, RVNL among top gainers today

review.headline_rewrite: Top Gainers & Losers on Sep 1: Ola, Kaynes Tech, GMDC, MCX, Swiggy, RVNL among top gainers today
bullets: Market sentiment was lifted by better-than-expected GDP growth in the June quarter, after equities were hammered last week by higher US tariffs.
The Nifty 50 gained 0.81% to close at 24,625, while the S&P BSE Sensex rose 0.70% to 80,364.
It was followed by the Nifty Consumer Durables, Nifty Metal, and Nifty Oil and Gas indices, which climbed 2.12%, 1.64%, and 1.35%, respectively.
The Federal Reserve tracks the PCE price measures for its 2% inflation target.

item.title: Maruti Suzuki sales dip marginally to 1,80,683 units in Aug

review.headline_rewrite: Maruti Suzuki sales dip marginally to 1,80,683 units in Aug
bullets: + 561.71 + 198.80 + 58.00 + 901.00 + 2,229.00 Maruti Suzuki India on Monday reported a marginal dip in total sales to 1,80,683
The auto major sold a total of 1,81,782 units in the same month of the last year.
Its total domestic passenger vehicle dispatches to dealers declined 8 per cent to 1,31,278 units from 1,43,075 units in the year-ago month, Maruti Suzuki
